faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about the Metro Yukthi system implementation

data_sources.question: What data sources does the system integrate with?
data_sources.answer: The system integrates with fitness certification databases, Maximo job-card systems, branding management platforms, mileage tracking systems, cleaning slot schedulers, and depot bay status monitors. It also includes synthetic data generation capabilities for testing and validation scenarios.

deployment.question: What is the deployment model for the system?
deployment.answer: The system is designed for on-premises deployment within secure government infrastructure. It operates as a containerized microservice architecture with nightly batch processing cycles and real-time monitoring capabilities. Cloud deployment options are available with appropriate security compliance.

security.question: How does the system ensure data security and compliance?
security.answer: The system implements end-to-end encryption, role-based access controls, audit logging, and compliance with government data protection standards. All ML models operate on anonymized datasets, and sensitive information is protected through advanced cryptographic methods.

audit_trails.question: What audit trails and governance features are available?
audit_trails.answer: Complete decision traceability with timestamped logs, explainable AI outputs showing decision rationale, change management workflows, approval processes for critical decisions, and comprehensive reporting dashboards for regulatory compliance and operational oversight.

override_governance.question: Can operators override system recommendations and how is this governed?
override_governance.answer: Yes, operators can override recommendations through a structured workflow requiring justification, supervisor approval, and documented reasoning. All overrides are logged, tracked for pattern analysis, and incorporated into model learning cycles while maintaining human oversight authority.

maximo_integration.question: How does the system integrate with existing Maximo infrastructure?
maximo_integration.answer: The system connects to Maximo through standard APIs and real-time data synchronization. It reads job-card status, maintenance schedules, and asset conditions while writing back recommendations and status updates. Custom integration adapters ensure seamless data flow and minimal disruption to existing workflows.
